entry.title: Ukraine Renews Calls for Weapons Amid Russian Attack on Eastern Cities
entry.content: Kyiv’s fresh appeals to Western nations came as Russia’s offensive threatened the final Ukrainian strongholds in the Luhansk region.

entry.title: A Ukrainian Woman Greeted Troops With a Soviet Flag. Now, She Tells Putin to Stop Killing Ukrainians.
entry.content: Anna Ivanova has emerged as a symbol for Russian propaganda, inspiring monuments across the country. But her tale is one of grief and poverty in the post-Soviet world.

entry.title: As War Rages in Ukraine, U.S. Military Studies Russian Weapons at a 'Petting Zoo'
entry.content: An Air Force intelligence squadron outside Las Vegas tends to a collection of Soviet weapons, using them to teach how to recognize an adversary’s arms—and defeat them.
